text: Ona disregard those berie ich nabozenstvo v vain mat rad bol social function totally absorbed v this worldly zivot. Remind this (Quran) lest soul suffer consequences its zly earnings It has ziaden GOD Lord a Zvladnut nor intercessor! it offer any laskavy z ransom it nie accepted They suffer consequences zly robota they zarabat; they incurred hellish pne painful retribution ich disbelief
